dcterms:creator: Ciara Pike-Burke
Steffen Grunewalder
dcterms:description: The recovering bandits model the time-varying behaviors of consumers, particularly how a consumer's interest in advertisements may recover over time after an initial purchase.
dcterms:title: Recovering Bandits

dcterms:creator: Z. Yu
Y. Xu
L. Tong
dcterms:description: The deadline scheduling problem involves scheduling electrical vehicle charging stations to maximize net rewards while minimizing penalties for unfulfilled charges.
dcterms:title: Deadline Scheduling

dcterms:creator: Samuli Aalto
Pasi Lassila
Prajwal Osti
dcterms:description: Wireless scheduling involves managing wireless clients with varying channel states to minimize holding costs while transmitting data.
dcterms:title: Wireless Scheduling
